sys:positions.title: head of the Foreign Relations Department
head of the International Relations department
Minister of Law, Justice and Parliamentary Affairs
Minister of Industry, Commerce, and Supplies

description: Hari Bahadur Basnet is a Nepalese politician with a M.Sc. in Engineering. He has served as the head of the Foreign Relations Department of the Rastriya Janashakti Party. Basnet began his political career in 1970, was elected three times to the Rastriya Panchayat, and was a Central Committee member of the Rastriya Prajatantra Party. In 2003, he was appointed to several ministerial roles in the cabinet of Surya Bahadur Thapa, including Minister of Law, Justice and Parliamentary Affairs, and Minister of Education and Sports.
short_description: Nepalese politician and former government minister.
